code: import React from'react';import{useCart}from'../context/CartContext';import'./Cart.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cart=()=>{const{cart,removeFromCart}=useCart();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Cart"}),cart.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your cart is empty."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"cart-list",children:cart.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"cart-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.imageUrl,alt:product.name,className:"cart-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"cart-name",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"cart-price",children:["$",product.price.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"remove-button",onClick:()=>removeFromCart(product._id),children:"Remove"})]})]},product._id))})]});};export default Cart;
